content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you considering to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student so I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 300 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros is much lower than the market price for this type of apartment in the city center. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to negotiate a higher amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I am willing to negotiate. But as a student, I have to be mindful of my budget. What is the highest amount you would consider for a student tenant?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I'm open to reasonable offers. For a student tenant, I might be willing to go slightly below the market rate. How about 450 euros per month? This is a competitive price for a student in the city center. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. However, I think we can still find a lower price. Considering that the apartment is unfurnished, the appliances are new, and it's a one-bedroom, I think we can find a middle ground. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 400 euros is still quite low for the location and the amenities. However, since you're a student, I'll make you an offer. If you're able to pay 425 euros per month, I'll include all utilities in that price. That way, you have one less bill to worry about. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a good deal. However, I think we can still find a lower price. How about 410 euros per month and I cover the utilities? That way, I can still save some money and you get your rent on time every month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but as a landlord, I need to ensure that I'm not losing out on potential income. 410 euros is still below my target price. If you're willing to pay 420 euros per month, I'll sign the contract right now. No more negotiations. What do you say? This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 415 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot agree to that price. It's too low for the value of the apartment. If you're willing to pay 420 euros per month, I'll sign the contract right now. No more negotiations. This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 420 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 420 euros per month! Let's proceed with the contract. Is there anything else we need to discuss?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
No, I think we have covered everything. I am very satisfied with the agreement.

[yourname]
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. Please let me know if you have any questions or need additional information for the contract. We can proceed with the paperwork once you're ready.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, [yourname]. I don't have any more questions. Let's proceed with the contract.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent! I'll get the contract ready for you to sign. In the meantime, if you have any other concerns or need to discuss anything else, feel free to contact me. Enjoy your stay in the apartment!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, [yourname]. I'm looking forward to moving in.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Maryam! I'm sure you'll be very happy in the apartment. If you have any issues or need assistance with anything, don't hesitate to contact me. I'm here to help. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, [yourname]. I really appreciate your help.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome! If you need anything else, just let me know. Have a great day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, [yourname]. You too.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Maryam. I hope you have a wonderful stay in your new apartment! If you need anything, don't hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, [yourname]. I really appreciate your help. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
